Package org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.core.part

Class PartTypeBase<P extends IPartType<P,S>,S extends IPartState<P>>

java.lang.Object
org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.api.part.PartTypeAdapter<P,S>
org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.core.part.PartTypeBase<P,S>
All Implemented Interfaces:
INetworkEventListener<IPartNetworkElement<P,S>>, IPartType<P,S>
Direct Known Subclasses:
PartTypeConfigurable, PartTypeConnector, PartTypePanel
public abstract class PartTypeBase<P extends IPartType<P,S>,S extends IPartState<P>> extends PartTypeAdapter<P,S>
An abstract IPartType with a default implementation for creating network elements.

      Description copied from interface: IPartType
      Create a network element for this part type.
      Parameters:
      partContainer - The container this part is/will be part of.
      pos - The position this network element is/will be placed at.

      public final void onEvent(INetworkEvent event, IPartNetworkElement<P,S> networkElement)
      Description copied from interface: INetworkEventListener
      Can be called at any time by the INetworkEventBus. Only events in the set from INetworkEventListener.getSubscribedEvents() will be received.

      public void writeExtraGuiData(net.minecraft.network.FriendlyByteBuf packetBuffer, PartPos pos, net.minecraft.server.level.ServerPlayer player)
      Description copied from interface: IPartType
